DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to estimate the incidence rates of Post-transplant Lymphoproliferative Disorder (PTLD), malignancy and hospitalized infections in adult kidney-only transplant recipients treated with Belatacept, and compared the incidences to the incidences in those treated with Calcineurin inhibitor (CNI) based regimens at the time of transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: Belatacept in Renal Transplantation: Analyses Using Data From the Collaborative Transplant Study
DOC.detailed_description: Time Perspective: Prospective design, Retrospective data collection and analysis
DOC.criteria: 1st kidney only transplant during study, at one of the transplant centers participating in CTS, received Belatacept or a CNI at the time of transplantation Patients with a history of malignancy
